briefTitle: P3 Study Comparing Once Daily SB204 and Vehicle Gel in Acne
officialTitle: A Phase 3 Multi-Center, Randomized, Double-Blinded, Vehicle-Controlled, Parallel Group Study Comparing the Efficacy, Tolerability and Safety of Once Daily SB204 and Vehicle Gel in the Treatment of Acne Vulgaris
summary: This is a 12 week, multi-center, double-blinded, randomized, vehicle-controlled, parallel group, study to be conducted in approximately 1300 subjects with acne vulgaris in the US.

primaryOutcome.measure: Absolute Change From Baseline in Inflammatory Lesion Counts
